name: Welcome Aboard: A Muppet Cruise to Computer Literacy
description:
Welcome Aboard is an educational game that tries to help people become more computer literate with the help of the Muppets. There are 5 different activities included:
  • The Bridge: help Kermit the Frog to steer the ship using a Logo-like programming language

  • The Game Room: play an arcade style game under the protests of Sam the Eagle

  • The Joke Library: learn fundamentals of database management by organizing Fozzie Bear's joke database

  • The Message Center: learn how to use word processing and email with Scooter

  • The Salon de Beaute: use a computer to find the perfect hairdo and outfit for Miss Piggy
